data.question: What is the chemical formula of LMOF-241?
What is the crystal system of LMOF-241?
What is the space group of LMOF-241?
What is the detection limit of Aflatoxin B1 using LMOF-241?
What method was used for the synthesis of the tppe ligand?
What is the BET surface area of LMOF-241 after degassing?
What is the role of Zn2+ ion in the luminescence of LMOFs?
data.answer: Zn2+ ion contributes negligibly in the luminescence of the resulting LMOFs.

data.question: Why is LMOF-241 considered an excellent candidate as fluorescence-based sensory material?
data.answer: Because of its high internal quantum yield of 92.7%.

data.question: What is the main mechanism of mycotoxin detection by LMOF-241?
What is the significance of the solvent exchange process in the preparation of LMOF-241 for mycotoxin detection?
data.answer: It replaces residual solvent molecules in the pores of LMOF-241 with dichloromethane (DCM) to prepare the sample for mycotoxin detection.

data.question: How does the structure of LMOF-241 facilitate its function as a mycotoxin sensor?
data.answer: The structure of LMOF-241 allows for efficient electron transfer from the MOF to toxin molecules, facilitating fluorescence quenching.

data.question: What is the role of the tppe ligand in the luminescence properties of LMOF-241?
data.answer: The tppe ligand is responsible for the strong emission in the final structure of LMOF-241.

data.question: Is the crystal system of LMOF-241 triclinic?
Is the detection limit of Aflatoxin B1 using LMOF-241 lower than the FDA's tolerant level for corn and peanut feeds for beef cattle?
Does LMOF-241 have a BET surface area of less than 1000 m2/g after degassing?
Is the Suzuki coupling reaction used for the synthesis of the bpdc ligand?
Does the Zn2+ ion enhance the luminescence of LMOF-241 by participating in the emission process?
Is the internal quantum yield of LMOF-241 less than 50%?
Is the electron transfer mechanism the only detection mechanism for mycotoxins by LMOF-241?
Does the solvent exchange process involve replacing DCM with water in the pores of LMOF-241?
